long_description: The Westcomb Shift LT Hoodie jacket is the lightest waterproof shell in the Westcomb lineup. It offers ounce-counting minimalists no-compromise wind and water protection in a featherweight design. Tightly woven 3-layer Polartec(R) NeoShell(R) ripstop nylon offers wet-weather protection and breathability; the soft fabric and 2-way stretch enhance your comfort. Micro seam taping ensures 100% protection and helps keep the Shift LT jacket lightweight and flexible. Super durable fabric adhesive affixes critical zipper and hem areas, creating waterproof, stitch-free, lightweight seams with weld-like durability and clean aesthetics. Helmet-compatible hood with stiff, welded brim cinches down for a close fit that provides unhindered peripheral vision. High collar with soft lined chin guard provides comfort and protection for your neck and face. Watertight front zipper provides smooth operation; interior stormflap prevents weather penetration. Rip-and-stick cuff closures keep snow, wind and rain from creeping in. Articulated sleeves allow unrestricted movement in any position. The Westcomb Shift LT Hoodie jacket has 1 zip chest pocket.
